title: LBoL Logs
subtitle: Run History Sharing
description: LBoL Logs is a run history sharing service of Touhou: Lost Branch of Legend.
about:
LBoL Logs is a run history sharing service of Touhou: Lost Branch of Legend (LBoL).

Feedbacks are welcome at my Discord thread.
compatability: Only run data generated by custom Mod <mod>LBoL Run Logger</mod> is supported.

runLogger.step2: Visit <mod>LBoL Run Logger</mod> and Install with Mod Manager
runLogger.step4: Find the run data file in runLogger folder inside the game folder
runLogger.step5: Share your run data from the <upload>Upload</upload> page
features: Exhibits revealed (except events and shops), acquired, lost, consumed
Cards revealed (except events and shops), acquired, lost, upgraded
Change of HP/Max HP, P/Max P, Gold
Enemy encounts (name and # of turns only)

tasks: Image of Vengeful Spirits, Menreikis and Spirit of Wealth/Elegance

value: No cookie is collected. (Language preference is saved in cookie yet.)
No private information, such as PC information, Steam account information, payment information, is collected by the Mod (excluding the in-game name) nor included in the generated data.
Although validation is performed before uploading, no responsibility will be accepted for user accidentially uploading private information.

file: Drag 'n' drop file here, or click to select file
